data.text:
@EU_Commission I've got a great idea.
Can I have some dosh?
A bit of loose change.

Say about 1.4bn Euro.
@EU_Commission No surprise about Ireland but if 67 per cent of Brits are happy in the EU, Brexit looks even crazier than it did already.

@EU_Commission donijela pravila koja će osigurati sugurbe elektronske uplate u trgovinama i online. Pravila omogućuju potrošačima da koriste inovativne usluge koje nude davatelji usluga trećih strana -FinTech, uz rigorozne zaštite i sigurnosti podataka za potrošače i tvrtke EU
@EU_Commission @Samillian1968 Oh yes, wouldn't move for anybody or anything. My home of many years and to end of my days.

@EU_Commission The more this goes on the more it proves Brexit was the correct choice. The EU is bullying and not negotiating because we are not doing what they want which is one of the reasons Brexit happened. Problem is it appears our gov are too weak to stand up to them.

@EU_Commission The ref question was clear do you want to leave the EU yes or no. Now when someone says to me leave that means leave not stay in some of it and leave some of it. Leave means leave. Or to put it bluntly to some of you remoaners it means get the fuck out
@EU_Commission I have always long to gain access to come to and live in Europe
@EU_Commission So remind me again why we are leaving

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @ChristianWigand @EU_Social Anything so I, and other remainders,  still have good ties and links to EU would be great. I can't afford to move to Europe, have no European relatives, have no option but to fight brexit and be dragged out kicking and screaming. #Remain
@EU_Commission Fake news not just a US preserve obviously.
@EU_Commission it is worrying that #Greece, one of the earliest to join, feels negatively about its #EU membership after 36 years.

@EU_Commission Your living in a fantasy land. Every country in europe has anti eu parties standing on general elections and the UK even had a referendum on the subject.  Ours was leave 52/48 remain and now you say 69% are happy to stay. Where did you do your survey in your own offices?
@EU_Commission @BerndMGawlik Romanians not happy with local politics restricting happiness percentage.
@EU_Commission The UNTRUSTWORTHY EU will never come up with any true figures, Who did they ask - The GRAVY TRAIN POLITICIANS?
@EU_Commission Increase #European #population and #motivate #European #youth for better #Europe
@EU_Commission @Iloveautumn2 Yes. And I see no point in being dragged out of the EU just because drunky Cameron was unable to control his members. (Ambiguity completely deliberate. )
@EU_Commission 69% on the uk?! wtf?!
@EU_Commission The ones who are happy living in the EU are those receiving massive handouts. That won't be so happy when they can't milk the UK cash cow.
@EU_Commission Happy lucky and privileged to live in Europe.

@EU_Commission Today Citizens are watching you !

#StopGlyphosate
@EU_Commission Els catalans tindrem dret al us d aquesta proteccio civil o si pasa res sera un afaire intern?
@EU_Commission Falta un tema “Republica Catalana” @JunckerEU @KRLS

@EU_Commission @JakeCordell As you might agree, I cannot that the format of that question would have survived the internal and external scrutiny applied by @The_IoD for our regular policy voice surveys....
@EU_Commission @natalieben How many people were asked? When? And where? Then it may be of some use!
@EU_Commission @LouDelBello I knew Hungary would be the last one 😓

@EU_Commission I don't know if that will work in Spain. There the national police beats the firemen when they try to do their job and protect people. And "justice" even want to judge them for that. There are a lot of this to rescue in Spain... 
I agree, #rescEU, but from the lack of democracy.

@EU_Commission Didn't opinion polls show >50% for EU2016?

(P.S. I didn't see Russia there. Did you mean EU?)
@EU_Commission Stand with a piggy bowl outside our Catholic church after mass service and don't forget a green lettered purpose sticker on it. Take help from Saint Vincent De Paul SVP.
@EU_Commission @AktarCengiz UK: 69%. So why don‘t you just call Brussels and tell them you weren‘t sober on June 23. last year?

@EU_Commission @Brexit toks may break-down. British divorce. You saw what happened to Prince "The Longears" Charles aka Charles The Bastard. UK is "world's divorce workshop, a nation of Exit shopkeepers."
@EU_Commission Not much of any significance. What’s the champagne bill this week?
@EU_Commission what a load of rubbish asked a different way 78% would say no
@EU_Commission Uk shame we didnt vote this way
@EU_Commission @natalieben Where as in the UK it was 48% and we not saying they were happy either, so what is your point?
@EU_Commission I'm happy living in the EU.
@EU_Commission @smitajamdar I haven't been asked but you can count me in, I'm very happy & proud to be a British European #StopBrexitNow
@EU_Commission And the wine list?
@EU_Commission What About  Catalan rights citizens??? #EU

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @AngelaMerkeICDU @EmmanuelMacron 
25th day - political prisoners in Spain, political prisoners in Europe

@EU_Commission @Simpleum Check this out: every person knows all other people via 7 friends. I on Facebook asked question of 250 people and their friends - have they ever been asked such question (about EU) - not my friends nor their friends never had. So, this statistic is a lie. (Latvia)

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @EUCouncil @EU2017EE @ratasjuri @EP_President @EC_StockholmRep Slavery Poverty illiteracy all are needed 2 be eradicated, Slavery and discrimination are the same Because in Somalia NGO's used to enslave some tribes the resource of international donors 4 instant in Jowhar - Somalia NGO pay workers a wages of US$ 1.5 while they sign $ 5

@EU_Commission Lovely. A biased poll that we can all look and laugh at.
Pathetic. The eu is finished.
@EU_Commission #Eurobarometer Malta run by the same #AlfredSant acolyte as forever?
@EU_Commission @dmrtownend #FutureofEurope very happy to be in the EU, but I also have plenty to complain about. Does go have in hand
@EU_Commission well
@EU_Commission @IlvesToomas why does Italy two different positions?
@EU_Commission Ah, the will of the people...
@EU_Commission I wasn't asked anything. I guess you only asked politcal party D66 members only LOL
@EU_Commission @SLOVAKIAinUK Even the UK is not in the relegation zone!  We're happy in the EU.  So what is all this messing about? #a50challenge

@EU_Commission In spite of the fact that the EU plays an important role in the everyday life of many Europeans, it will still be seen as a failure as long as the migration issue and associated problems have not been settled to the satisfaction of the majority of the Europeans.
@EU_Commission lol, i guess this was only asked amongst the ones working in brussel, those would be the only ones to totally agree, because big money. I hope you believe your own fakenews.
@EU_Commission Do you want an EU army #PESCO?
@EU_Commission Catalan people who belive in human rights could not be satisfied right now!!!
@EU_Commission @MarieAnnUK If this sort of statistic is true for the UK - shame on all those complacent sods who didn’t vote to avoid the #shambles #ashamed2bbritish
@EU_Commission @BremainInSpain Best place in the world to live in every single way.

@EU_Commission This is pure self-propaganda! Where can we find the full research report? In NL 92% is simply not true if the questions implied the suggested 'happy with the EU', given the current polls and political views of various parties.
@EU_Commission @AreskougEU According to this poll 79% of people want to stay in UK but that was without being told all the irresponsible fake news
@EU_Commission Hebben ze alleen asielzoekers en hun pamperaars gevraagt zeker?

@EU_Commission Please know that @DUPleader does not speak for Northern Ireland. She is terrible at Maths. She thinks that 1 = 1.6 & that 44% is bigger than 56%.
We prefer leaders who can do Maths. That is all.
@EU_Commission Yes I am
@EU_Commission I was not questioned obviously...
@EU_Commission Vreemd, de landen van de #Neuro doe het veel beter dan die van de #Zeuro of #Oeuro. Plausibele uitslag!? Wie is opdrachtgever onderzoek?
@EU_Commission There are three kind of lies: lies, big lies and statistics isn't it ?
@EU_Commission 69 precent in the UK! I wish they had made that clearer in June 2016.
@EU_Commission 69% happy in the EU in Britain. So much for the 'will of the people' being to leave. #StopBrexit immediately!
@EU_Commission What was the methodology..?
@EU_Commission Less and less. Thanks to you.
@EU_Commission UK proportion is not exactly supportive of Brexit, is it?
@EU_Commission @pmwBxl It would be great when Kosovo joins to EU
@EU_Commission If the sample is representative, about 18% of the British is saying sorry in a cute way. Keep them.
@EU_Commission #brexit #nexit #eussr
@EU_Commission Bullshit Daar trapt #SON niet in Eigenlijk triest dat je moet neppen om een Volk te knechten Gelukkig zijn er nog wakkere jullie #eussr gaat niet door #federaalZonderVolk

@EU_Commission @PhilHoganEU Yeah. 

Put it to a vote. Go on. Dare you.
@EU_Commission Just where did you get your 69% figure for the UK? DreamsRus?
@EU_Commission Happy. What sort of questionnaire is that? Define happiness. happy with what?  Happiness - that must be on a scale of 1-5 or whatever.
@EU_Commission The result of EU policy during the financial crisis, the poor and rich countries, north and south. Congratulations EU

@EU_Commission It's a badly worded question.  I could be happy to live in the EU (i.e., Europe), especially given most of the alternatives, but still be opposed to EU membership of the country I am living in.
@EU_Commission @MartinSelmayr 69% in UK!
@EU_Commission 68% of the Dutch voted against a EU constitution, so these numbers don’t match. We also have a Brexit.. so these are not legit numbers.

@EU_Commission Yes. Europe makes me happy since almost 60 years. And that is because of original European populace and traditions, and not because of Brussels bureaucracy circle, who pretend to have invented Europe.
@EU_Commission I am looking fwd the next edition, i will def. say "totally disagree" #ShameOnEU
@EU_Commission @billybragg Good job, since it is been increasing enforced on the population
@EU_Commission Such a surprise  Luxembourg ( nil points) is at the top. Juncker’s favourite.
@EU_Commission Can’t wait until UK is out. Roll on 2019
@EU_Commission That's more than 50% of the total: it's a much higher percentage than those you said either "Yes, agree" or "No, disagree".
@EU_Commission Is a joke? Make the question to the catalans, that we are living a dictatorship in the XXI century in the heart of Europe

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU @eu_eeas Don't we have NATO, a pretty rock solid and powerful organisation developed after WW2? We have American and British fire power to protect Europe. I worry that EU defence is that back door to allow a rearming of the German Military, which is too soon after the atrocities.

@EU_Commission Would be interesting to see the difference in the Czech Republic before and after the Slovak adoption of the Euro - a significant change in discourse with regards to the Euro occurred within CZ as a result hereof

@EU_Commission @billybragg The question can be read to mean "are you happy to live in the EU, rather than in a current non-EU country" or "are you happy that the country you live in is a member of the EU". Two different questions.
@EU_Commission Also reduce unemployment
@EU_Commission @jpublik 69% of UK citizens are happy to live in the EU- WTF ? Why are we leaving?
@EU_Commission Propaganda
@EU_Commission Unia jest słaba, lewacka i bez wizji!
@EU_Commission So, how to deal with this paradox: Poland among one of happiest to be in the EU family and at the same among most antieuropean democracies?
@EU_Commission What comon actions can EU take when people are beaten for voting?
@EU_Commission Noo. I m happy to life in The Netherlands. Yes and 70% of the Dutch are against the EU! #NEXIT
